ComicInfo.Penciller: Doug Mahnke,Gary Davis,Leopoldo Durañona,Gary Davis,Leopoldo Durañona,Doug Mahnke
ComicInfo.Summary: Someone has hired a Filippino assassin dubbed Amurao to kill off drug dealers. Amurao believes that he has to devour his victims' eyes so that they cannot identify their killer. Interrupted while killing Porfiro Gravas, he only manages to eat one eye. Breaking into the morgue in order to devour the second eye, he is promptly arrested by the police. Amurao is driven insane by terror; now all his victims can find him through the spirit of Porfiro Gravas...
ComicInfo.Title: The Twilight of Langdarro (Part II); Race of Scorpions Part IV; Second Sight
ComicInfo.Writer: Gary Davis,John Arcudi,Leopoldo Durañona,Gary Davis,Leopoldo Durañona,John Arcudi
